news.title: War between bacteria, phages benefits humans
news.summary: In our battle with cholera bacteria, we may have an unknown ally in bacteria-killing viruses known as phages. Researchers report that phages can force cholera bacteria, even during active infection in humans, to give up their virulence in order to survive.
